mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST_COMMENT_REPORT ( ID, POST_COMMENT_REPORT_CONTENT, POST_COMMENT_ID, MEMBER_ID, POST_COMMENT_REPORT_CREATE_AT ) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_COMMENT_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{postCommentReportContent}, #{postCommentId}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT RPR.ID AS id, RPR.POST_REPLY_ID AS postReplyId, PR.POST_COMMENT_ID AS postCommentId, PC.POST_ID AS postId, P.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, PR.POST_REPLY_CONTENT AS postReplyContent, RU.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS reportedUserNickname, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS reporterNickname, RPR.POST_REPLY_REPORT_CONTENT AS postReplyReportContent, SYSDATE AS reportDate, 'pending' AS status FROM TBL_POST_REPLY_REPORT RPR JOIN TBL_POST_REPLY PR ON RPR.POST_REPLY_ID = PR.ID JOIN TBL_POST_COMMENT PC ON PR.POST_COMMENT_ID = PC.ID JOIN TBL_POST P ON PC.POST_ID = P.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON RPR.MEMBER_ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER RU ON PR.MEMBER_ID = RU.ID ORDER BY RPR.ID DESC

SELECT PCR.ID AS id, PCR.POST_COMMENT_ID AS postCommentId, PC.POST_COMMENT_CONTENT AS postCommentContent, PCR.POST_COMMENT_REPORT_CONTENT AS postCommentReportContent, PCR.MEMBER_ID AS reporterId, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS reporterNickname FROM TBL_POST_COMMENT_REPORT PCR JOIN TBL_POST_COMMENT PC ON PCR.POST_COMMENT_ID = PC.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON PCR.MEMBER_ID = M.ID ORDER BY PCR.ID DESC
